sentences.sContent: Let I not imprecation I of pain and sufferings will stop.
sentences.sContent_eng: Let I not imprecation I of pain and sufferings will stop.
sentences.sCn: 让我不祈求我的痛苦会停止。

sentences.sContent: Breeze, very clean, I shut a last eye, my hands match ten, the moon of my imprecation tonight, don't be piercing I drift on water of sadness.
sentences.sContent_eng: Breeze, very clean, I shut a last eye, my hands match ten, the moon of my imprecation tonight, don't be piercing I drift on water of sadness.
sentences.sCn: 风，很干净，我闭上双眼，我双手合十，我祈求今夜的月亮，不要刺痛我漂泊的忧伤。

trans.tranOther: an offensive word or phrase, used when someone is very angry
